mchorse.mappet.api.scripts.user

Interface IScriptEvent


  • public interface IScriptEvent
    Script event. This interface represent the event, the only argument that was passed into script's function. It contains many different useful methods to interact with Minecraft on the server side.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void executeCommand(java.lang.String command)
      Execute a command
      IScriptEntity object()
      Get object (secondary) entity that was passed into the event
      void send(java.lang.String message)
      Send a message to all players in the chat
      boolean sendTo(IScriptEntity entity, java.lang.String message)
      Send a message only to one player
      IScriptServer server()
      Get the server in which this event happened
      IScriptEntity subject()
      Get subject (primary) entity that was passed into the event
      java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> values()
      Get a map of extra context values that was passed into the event
      IScriptWorld world()
      Get the world in which this event happened

      • sendTo

        boolean sendTo(IScriptEntity entity,
               java.lang.String message)
        Send a message only to one player
        Returns:
        whether event was able to send the message (i.e. if entity isn't a player, it will return false)
